LanguageData.Cults_PFlyingObject.label: flying object
LanguageData.Cults_PPsionicBlast.label: psionic blast
LanguageData.Cults_PPsionicShock.label: psionic blast
LanguageData.Cults_PPsionicBurn.label: psionic burn
LanguageData.Mote_BlastBlackEMP.label: darkness
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.label: byakhee
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.description: Interstellar predators that can travel through the vacuum of space by means of an organ known as the "hune," Byakhee are said to be servants of Hastur the Unspeakable. Through this servitude, Byakhee have been observed being mounted by the faithful to the Yellow Sign.
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.1.label: stinger
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.2.label: left claw
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.3.label: right claw
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.4.label: wings
LanguageData.CH_Leather_Byakhee.label: byakhee chitin
LanguageData.CH_Leather_BlackGoathide.label: black goathide
LanguageData.CH_Leather_ReanimatedCorpse.label: reanimated leather
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.label: formless spawn
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.description: Deep beneath the earth, formless spawn rest in basins in Tsathoggua temples and act as guardians of the holy grounds. They are formed of goo capable of acidic digestion of matter, and thus are formidable foes with high resistance and high damage.
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.tools.1.label: left claw
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.tools.2.label: right claw
LanguageData.Cults_FormlessSpawnRace.tools.3.label: tentacles
LanguageData.CH_Leather_FormlessSpawn.label: formless matter
LanguageData.Apparel_BastRobes.description: This sacred wrap allows priests to preach with greater appeal by appealing to Bast. It also tends to allow for better preaching in locations that face greater threat from the sun and heat.
LanguageData.Apparel_BastRobes.label: cultist vestments (bast)
LanguageData.Apparel_BastMask.label: cultist hood (bast mask)
LanguageData.Apparel_BastMask.description: For worshippers of Bast, this mask is designed for the sole purpose of looking more pleasing to your deity. With it, your chants seem more potent and their insidious whispering is more constant.
LanguageData.Apparel_CultistRobes.label: cultist robes
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMFurRobes.description: Similar to other robes that cultists wear, however, these ones are specifically made for colder environments.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMFurRobes.label: cultist robes (fur)
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMWrapRobes.description: This sacred wrap allows priests to preach with greater appeal by appearing as a simple or lowly creature. It also tends to allow for better preaching in locations that face greater threat from the sun and heat.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMWrapRobes.label: cultist vestments (wrap)
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMCthulhuRobes.description: Adorned with faux tentacles, this imposing robe is favored by priests of Nyarlathotep or Cthulhu.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMCthulhuRobes.label: cultist vestments (tentacled)
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMDagonRobes.description: Impressive looking vestments preferred by orders of Dagon or Hastur.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMDagonRobes.label: cultist vestments (traditional)
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMShubRobes.description: These woodland priestly robes adorned with sacred twigs appeal to deities like Shub-Niggurath.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMShubRobes.label: cultist vestments (druidic)
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMHasturRobes.description: These robes have been heavily dyed yellow, hiding the original materials used in its tailoring. Heavily favored by Hastur.
LanguageData.Apparel_ROMHasturRobes.label: cultist vestments (yellow)
LanguageData.Apparel_SailorUniform.label: sailor uniform
LanguageData.Apparel_CultistHood.label: cultist hood (shrouded)
LanguageData.Apparel_HasturHood.label: cultist hood (yellow)
LanguageData.Apparel_HasturHood.description: An unearthly sickly yellow hue radiates from this hood.
LanguageData.Apparel_CthulhuMaskHood.label: cultist hood (cthulhu mask)
LanguageData.Apparel_CthulhuMaskHood.description: This mask is designed for the sole purpose of looking more pleasing to your deity. With it, your chants seem more potent and their insidious whispering is more constant.
LanguageData.Apparel_NyarlathotepHood.label: cultist hood (nyarlathotep)
LanguageData.Apparel_NyarlathotepHood.description: For worshippers of Nyarlathotep, this hood is designed for the sole purpose of looking more pleasing to your deity. With it, your chants seem more potent and their insidious whispering is more constant.
LanguageData.Apparel_DagonMitre.label: cultist hood (dagon mitre)
LanguageData.Apparel_DagonMitre.description: For worshippers of Dagon, this mitre cap is designed for the sole purpose of looking more pleasing to your deity. With it, your chants seem more potent and their insidious whispering is more constant.
LanguageData.Apparel_ShubMask.label: cultist hood (shub-niggurath mask)
LanguageData.Apparel_ShubMask.description: For worshippers of Shub-Niggurath, this mask is designed for the sole purpose of looking more pleasing to your deity. With it, your chants seem more potent and their insidious whispering is more constant.
LanguageData.Apparel_StandardHood.label: cultist hood (simple)
LanguageData.Apparel_SailorsCap.label: sailors cap
LanguageData.Cults_Alcove.label: alcove
LanguageData.Cults_AlcoveTorch.label: alcove (torch)
LanguageData.Cults_AlcoveTorch.description: A recess in a wall with a torch hanging inside.
LanguageData.Cults_SignOfDagon.label: sign of Dagon
LanguageData.Cults_SignOfDagon.description: Designates a spot where the guardians of the deep may roam. It's recommended to keep these magic circles outside of the colony. Once they arrive, the guardians will defend the spot the circle originated at until their death. Avoid bringing colonists near their circle.
LanguageData.Cults_PrayerPillow.label: prayer pillow
LanguageData.Cults_PrayerPillow.description: A small, soft, comfy seat. Great for meditation.
LanguageData.Cults_PewLinkable.label: linkable pews
LanguageData.Cults_PewLinkable.description: A linkable bench designed for worshippers to sit and observe rituals.
LanguageData.Cults_ForbiddenKnowledgeCenter.label: forbidden knowledge center
LanguageData.Cults_ForbiddenKnowledgeCenter.descripti: A simplistic table covered in strange symbols, notes, and a tome of forbidden knowledge. Researchers work here to uncover forces beyond. Prolonged usage will result in sanity loss, yet the rewards will be worthwhile.
LanguageData.Cult_SacrificialAltar.label: cult altar
LanguageData.Cult_SacrificialAltar.description: A solid surface on which to elevate speeches of worship to extra-cosmic entities.
LanguageData.Cult_AnimalSacrificeAltar.label: sacrificial altar
LanguageData.Cult_AnimalSacrificeAltar.description: A solid surface on which to sacrifice to beings both petty and powerful. Specially designed to channel and collect blood.
LanguageData.Cult_HumanSacrificeAltar.label: sacrificial altar
LanguageData.Cult_HumanSacrificeAltar.description: A solid surface on which to sacrifice to beings both petty and powerful. Specially designed to channel and collect blood.
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Red.label: obelisk (red)
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Red.description: A mysterious upright standing block of stone. It has been specially blessed with a red aura.
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Green.label: obelisk (green)
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Green.descripti: A mysterious upright standing block of stone. It has been specially blessed with a green aura.
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Blue.label: obelisk (blue)
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Blue.descriptio: A mysterious upright standing block of stone. It has been specially blessed with a blue aura.
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Yellow.label: obelisk (yellow)
LanguageData.Cults_ObeliskConstructed_Yellow.descript: A mysterious upright standing block of stone. It has been specially blessed with a yellow aura.
LanguageData.Cults_SleepTotem.label: sleep totem
LanguageData.Cults_SleepTotem.description: Totem that draws invaders towards it and induces them into an inescapable trance, where dreams devour dreamers. The effect is limited enough to delay intruders long enough to expose them to other hazards.
LanguageData.Cults_FertilityTotem.label: fertility totem
LanguageData.Cults_FertilityTotem.description: Totem that increases growth rate of crops for two quadrums.
LanguageData.Cults_SunkenShipChunk.label: sunken ship chunk
LanguageData.Cults_SunkenShipChunk.description: A chunk of a naval craft. Can be deconstructed to discover treasures within.
LanguageData.Cults_TreasureChest.label: treasure chest
LanguageData.Cults_TreasureChest.description: A locked and sealed chest designed to keep goods and valuables safe from both man and nature.
LanguageData.Cults_TreasureChest_Relic.label: relic chest
LanguageData.Cults_TreasureChest_Relic.description: A locked and sealed chest designed to keep goods and valuables safe from both man and nature.
LanguageData.Cults_LandedShip.label: landed marine ship
LanguageData.Cults_LandedShip.description: A seaworthy ship plucked from the ocean by Dagon. It may contain exotic materials, computers, or even AI personas. Expect it to be surrounded by sailors stricken with madness.
LanguageData.Cults_MonolithNightmare.label: Obelisk
LanguageData.Cults_MonolithNightmare.description: A mysterious pyramid-like block of stone. It has an insidious aura.
LanguageData.Cult_NightmareSacrificeAltar.label: corrupted altar
LanguageData.Cult_NightmareSacrificeAltar.description: A corpse has sprung up as a tree that corrupts your altar. It will need repairs and a lot of pruning.
LanguageData.Cults_BurstingTentacle.label: bursting tentacle
LanguageData.Cults_WombBetweenWorlds.label: Womb Between Worlds
LanguageData.YigSculptureLarge.label: large serpent humanoid sculpture
LanguageData.YigSculptureLarge.description: A person-sized piece of material in the shape of a snake man sculpted into an artistic form.
LanguageData.SculptureCthulhu.label: monstrous octopoid sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureCthulhu.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the stylised form of a giant bulbous head. Tentacles snake out from where a mouth would be and glare down in contempt.
LanguageData.SculptureBast.label: monstrous feline sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureBast.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the stylised form of a massive egyptian cat. Glorious.
LanguageData.SculptureDagon.label: monstrous fish-headed sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureDagon.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the face of a deep one. Its eyes are large and toadish and stare out, blankly. The teeth are almost as long as your arm. If it were real, it could swallow you with one bite.
LanguageData.SculptureNyarlathotep.label: monstrous hooded sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureNyarlathotep.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the shape of a cloaked figure wreathed in shapes that seem ordered at first but is then betrayed by an underlying chaos.
LanguageData.SculptureShub.label: monstrous goat-like sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureShub.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the stylised form of a goat's head. Behind which is a mass of vines or tentacles writhing around one another and menacing the onlooker.
LanguageData.SculptureTsathoggua.label: monstrous abomination sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureTsathoggua.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the stylised form of a giant bulbous head. This wide squat-shaped amalgation of a bat, toad, and other creatures creates a unique and yet unsettling visage that glares with a ravenous hunger.
LanguageData.SculptureHastur.label: monstrous king sculpture
LanguageData.SculptureHastur.description: A car-sized piece of material sculpted into the stylised form of a giant bulbous head. An ominous king stands before a kingdom, staring downwards.
LanguageData.Cults_ElixerOfPower.label: elixer of power
LanguageData.Cults_ElixerOfPower.description: This stone flask is wrapped with golden inlays and a watchful eye made of a rare gemstone. When held, it feels like a heart is beating inside. When uncapped, all one sees is a black liquid. Inscriptions along the back seem to indicate that consuming this elixer would grant untold powers. The powers will fade in time, possibly within a season. During that time, one is treated to the taste of godlike power.
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicBrain.label: psionic lobe
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicBrain.description: A mysterious tumorous growth that grants minor telekinetic and psychic powers.
LanguageData.Cults_MonstrousBrain.label: monstrous brain
LanguageData.Cults_MonstrousBrain.description: A mysterious tumorous growth that grants advanced intelligence.
LanguageData.Cults_MonstrousBody.label: monstrous body
LanguageData.Cults_MonstrousBody.description: A modified body that changes the size of the pawn.
LanguageData.Cults_TentacleArm.label: tentacle
LanguageData.Cults_TentacleArm.description: Mysterious appendage that writhes of its own accord forming unusual patterns in its movements.
LanguageData.Cults_CthulhidTentacle.label: cthulhid tentacle
LanguageData.Cults_CthulhidTentacle.description: Mysterious appendage that writhes of its own accord forming unusual patterns in its movements.
LanguageData.Cults_CthulhidEyestalk.label: horrifying eyestalk
LanguageData.Cults_CthulhidEyestalk.description: Mysterious eye-appendage that writhes of its own accord forming unusual patterns in its movements.
LanguageData.Cults_Grimoire.label: grimoire of the occult
LanguageData.Cults_Grimoire.description: At first glance, the grimoire compells the viewer to halt their gait. Upon closer examination, the seals and clasps that hold the tome tightly closed become like a boggling puzzle to a starved intellectual. What secrets could it possess? No, ...what powers?
LanguageData.Cults_TheKingInYellow.label: The King in Yellow
LanguageData.Cults_TheKingInYellow.description: The King in Yellow appears as a mysterious, glowing book. The contents of which are mundane during the first act of the play, however proceeding beyond the first act of the play causes madness and a cult-like obsession with an ancient symbol described simply as The Yellow Sign.
LanguageData.Cults_BlackIchorMeal.label: black ichor
LanguageData.Cults_BlackIchorMeal.description:
Ichor can be a liquid that runs through the veins of the gods. The true origin of this black ichor, however, is a mystery.

It is abysmal to behold, dark and black like a bottomless pit. Its texture is coagulated in places with the consistency of sausages hiding in very light sauces. The smell is not quite nauseating, as the smell bears just a hint of what one would find in a dark cave. Strangest of all is the taste. Once it touches the tongue, all of the irksome properties transform into a delightful honey-flavor, and the thickened portions taste of sweetmeats.

This thick soupy black ichor nourishes and invigorates followers of Tsathoggua at the cost of very little sanity loss.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.label: cult kris
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.description: One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon. This particular knife is designed and sanctified for the ritualistic carving of flesh.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Cults_PlantTreeNightmare.label: eerie tree
LanguageData.Cults_PlantTreeNightmare.description: An ominous tree with an indescibable aura. Approaching this tree causes most colonists a great deal of anxiety. Drawing closer, colonists swear they can hear voices speaking in strange tongues.
LanguageData.Cults_GuardianBast_Fur.description: Furry pelt of a guardian of Bast. Luxurious and extraordinarily durable. Used for the highest-quality crafts for its insulation and strength.
LanguageData.Cults_GuardianBast_Fur.label: guardian fur
LanguageData.GuardianBast.label: Guardian
LanguageData.GuardianBast.description: A divine protector sent by Bast to protect you.
LanguageData.GuardianBast.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GuardianBast.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GuardianBast.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.label: black goat
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.description: Black goats are mysterious creatures that live in almost any climate. Their diet is also unknown. Legends tell about them being the spawn of some obscene monstrosity known as the Black Goat Mother that exists outside of the reality we understand as our dimension.
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.label: reanimated corpse
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.description: Whether due to scientific experimentation, occult interference, or comic fluke, these are poor souls for whom death has been abjured.
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Cults_FilthBlackSlime.label: black slime
LanguageData.Cults_TransmogAura.label: transmog aura
LanguageData.ByakheeIncoming.label: flyer (incoming)
LanguageData.ByakheeLeaving.label: flyer (leaving)
LanguageData.ByakheeLanded.label: flyer (landed)
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.tools.2.label: wings
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.tools.3.label: teeth
LanguageData.Cults_ByakheeRace.tools.tools.4.label: stinger
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CultKris.tools.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Cults_BlackGoat.tools.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.tools.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.ReanimatedCorpse.tools.tools.1.label: right fist
